name: Spartan Sprint
description:
Spartan, you must keep running! Don't let the darkness engulf you...

An endless runner set in an ancient Greek labyrinth. Switch between lanes, jump, slide, and sprint to survive!

Controls: ActionKeyboardGamepadSwitch Lanes[A] & [D] or [←] & [→]Left Stick or D-PadJump[W] or [Space] or [↑]Button South ([A])Slide[S] or [↓][Down]Sprint[LShift] or [Control][LB] or [RB]

This game was submitted as the final major collaborative project for the first year of BSc Video Game Development at Birmingham City University.

Credits: Joe Bevis (Lead Developer) Kriss Burgess-James (Character and GUI Programmer) Bailey Doughty (Obstacle Layout Designer) Tristan Orton (Concept Designer) Tamarla Mann (Lead Environment Artist) Erin Armstrong (Environment and GUI Artist) Ivy Fields (Environment and Prop Artist)
